definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The effort to privatize state-owned enterprises turned into an enrichment scheme for cronies of the regime.
sentences.chinese: 而國企私有化則成了政權姻親的致富模式。

sentences.english: This is again a case of privatizing the gains and socializing the losses;
sentences.chinese: 這是又一次的私有化收益，公有化損失。

sentences.english: We learned all the tricks of privatization.
sentences.chinese: 我們學到了私有化的所有技巧。

sentences.english: Privatization and pro-longed wage arrears enlarged the income gap.
sentences.chinese: 私有化及長期薪資欠款則進一步擴大所得差距。

sentences.english: New investments have targeted energy generation and privatized distribution.
sentences.chinese: 新增投資將專項用於能源發電和私有化配電服務。

sentences.english: Airlines grouch that landing fees always rise at privatised airports.
sentences.chinese: 航空公司抱怨說，私有化機場的降落費一直都在漲。

sentences.english: Privatized individual accounts are only a portion of the pension spectrum though.
sentences.chinese: 然而，私有化的個人賬戶只是養老金的一個組成部分。

sentences.english: Argentina had already privatized all that it could to get public revenue.
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷此前已經將所有利稅來源私有化了。

sentences.english: But critics say that the scheme amounts to privatisation of natural resources.
sentences.chinese: 但是批評者說這個計劃會導致自然資源的私有化。

sentences.english: For this to happen, nationally-owned properties must be privatized .
sentences.chinese: 爲了達到這個目的，國家擁有的財產必須私有化。

sentences.english: There is talk of a privatisation process post-2012.
sentences.chinese: 有傳聞稱，中國將在2012年後開始私有化進程。

sentences.english: Either they should be forced to make it as private companies or they should be nationalized.
sentences.chinese: 要麼“雙房”被強制真正私有化，要麼國有化。

sentences.english: The government started to denationalize financial institutions.
sentences.chinese: 政府開始對金融機構進行私有化。

sentences.english: One idea being floated is to take the firm private.
sentences.chinese: 私有化是目前風傳的一個想法。

sentences.english: The fish had not only been privatized, they had been securitized.
sentences.chinese: 魚不僅被私有化了，它們還被證券化了。

sentences.english: Firstly, land privatization affected the finances of the Assyrian Empire.
sentences.chinese: 首先，土地私有化影響到亞述帝國的財政。

definition: merger and acquisition (M and A)/acquisition/to take over
to separate off/to hive off/a demerger
to nationalize/to take over as communal property
to own a controlling number of shares in a company
to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
